job description:
Job Description:

Job Description: Interchange Job Description - SQL Server Data and Analytics Specialist

Overview:
  • Work as part of a high functioning team, tasked with supporting day to day operations of a busy Legal Services project, analyzing and maintaining very large transactional datasets in SQL Server
  • Independently define and develop solutions, with minimal direction, for a wide range of technical and analytical problems
  • Participate in team meetings and other collaborations, as well as design and peer reviews
  • Be flexible; prepared to approach things laterally; able to think outside the box
Responsibilities:
  • Develop, debug and test TSQL code in appropriate environments
  • Interface with business stakeholders, to identify or clarify requirements in order to address various questions/problems
  • Develop analytical strategies to analyze and interpret data in support of discovery efforts
  • Manage and prioritize assigned tasks, ensuring deadlines are achieved, communicating appropriately progression and/or impedances
Knowledge/Experience:
  • Knowledge and experience of the Payment Card Industry is preferred but not required.
  • Experience creating and supporting complex SQL Server objects, batch processes and batch scripts
  • Experience performing complex data analysis of very large datasets
  • Experience tuning TSQL queries
  • Experience using SQL Server error handling
  • Experience using source control
  • Experience following change release processes
  • Ability to understand complex business processes and adapt solutions to meet the needs of the business
  • Excellent communication skills for interaction with peers, managers and business stakeholders
  • Must enjoy and have experience working in a fast paced environment
  • Ability to quickly realign with shifting priorities
Technical Skills:
  • Advanced knowledge and experience working in Microsoft SQL Server 2012 (or later) and TSQL required
  • Advanced Database performance tuning skills preferred
  • Experience working with very large datasets of 10TB or more
  • Integrated Services (SSIS) or other Extract Transform & Load (ETL) experience a plus
  • Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS) and Team Foundation Services (TFS) experience a plus
